doc.field: New-York Historical Society collection accession registers
New-York Historical Society collection accession registers

The entries for 1852 indicate month and day only through early April, followed by an undated list of donations, presumably also from 1852 though it cannot be discerned whether or not the year is fully represented in the register. The end pages of the register were used for other lists; those lists identifiable are of individuals receiving tickets on February 19, 1852, "for the anniversary"; of Executive Committee members; and of proposed new members and their sponsors. Bound by N-YHS July 2, 1936.
New-York Historical Society collection accession registers
